prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with a slimy body and charming green eyes.
Imagine a cute, purple creature that can navigate through forests and caves.
Generate a unique evolution of a snail-like Pokemon with elegant features.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in wetland areas, showcasing vibrant colors.
Show me a friendly dragon Pokemon that loves to explore grassy terrains.
Make a whimsical creature with distinctively long ears and a slippery appearance.
Give me a Pokemon that exudes calmness and is found near water sources.
